title: Shurima Desert Zilean Passive Visual Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: Sometimes when using Zilean's passive with the Shurima skin, the animation will loop until you die. Attacking, using abilities, and moving have no effect on his model. I have only seen it on Shurima Desert, but other skins may be effected.

replies.body:
Hey Ernest P Warrel -

Thanks for the report! Since this skin's using base particles, I have a feeling it may be a larger issue that relates to the champion base skin and other skins using base particles. I can take a look and see what's going on here. :)
